Description:
Compact, Convenient and Contemporary
A home oozing luxury and comfort - Don't wait long as this surprise package is sure to impress and will not last!
Upon entry you're greeted with a sun drenched, free flowing upper level. The generously sized living/dining area is equipped with split system heating/cooling, custom light fittings and large sliding doors that open out on to a full length balcony with Bay views. The kitchen overlooking the dining and living is furnished with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, 900mm gas cooktop and oven, with ample cupboard space. The spacious master bedroom hosts a full ensuite and walk-in-robe which completes the upper level of the home.
Central stairs flow to the ground level where you will find the second living area, second bedroom with built-in-robes, large light filled bathroom, laundry with outdoor access complete with internal access to the single lock up garage.
Set upon 396m2 this secluded corner block is shielded by secure fences and shrubbery allowing you to entertain in privacy. The wow factor is really set with the outdoor entertaining areas; the current owners have utilised every inch of space to produce a truly enviable outdoor area. You will find multiple sitting areas Including an undercover outdoor dining area equipped with a ceiling fan and café blinds allowing you to entertain all year round with ease. A large lush lawn space, surrounded by manicured fruit trees and two separate decked areas really make this the ideal entertainer's paradise!
Whether you are looking to downsize, invest in our lucrative market or are in need of a dual occupancy type set up then 28 Gange Place may just be for you.
Other features of the home include ducted heating, split system cooling, surround sound speakers in the 2nd living area, Tasmanian Oak flooring, generous under-stair storage, water tanks, and garden shed, all while being located in a gorgeous, uninterrupted pocket of Clifton Springs. All amenities, shops, transport, schools and everything the Bellarine has to offer at your finger-tips - Why would you live anywhere else?!
Insights: 28 Gange Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 101 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Double Brick Delight
This charming double-brick home, situated upon a whopping 809m2 is sure to have your imagination running wild from the moment you step inside!
Boasting 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a multitude of options to renovate and add your own touch or to simply enjoy the retro features as it - the choice is yours!
The sunroom entry, which could also be used as a second living area, runs along the side of the home. A cosy sitting area flows into the spacious lounge room offering air-conditioning, gas heating and also a nifty study nook. An open dining area and U-shaped kitchen, which is equipped with a gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher, ample storage and also a generous walk-in-pantry. The huge master bedroom offers a large built-in-robe and then further walk-through robes, with French doors leading into the fully equipped en-suite.
The rear of the home encompasses bedrooms 2 and 3, both spacious with built-in-robes, bathroom with a huge corner combined shower/bath and spacious laundry with plenty of storage at hand.
From the laundry, you're greeted by an enormous established garden, offering mature fruit trees, garden shed and open space to personalise.
Nestled behind a secure fence with dual access makes this is an ideal home for those with caravans, boats and trailers alike. Also on offer is a large DLUG with internal access and access to down the side of the home.
This is the perfect entry level home for First Home Buyers or a great addition to the portfolio for all you savvy investors. If location is key and you want a home with close proximity to the Bay, public transport at your finger-tips and all amenities Clifton Springs and Drysdale has on offer, then stop looking because this is it!
Insights: 101 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Tranquility!
A peaceful court location, a picturesque land holding of approximately 668m2 and beautiful established gardens provide a truly tranquil setting for this quality built 'home' which has undergone a renovation of the highest calibre. Only on inspection will you get a true appreciation of the clever design features, a healthy respect for yester year and uncompromising 'top shelf' finishes throughout.
• This delightful home sits effortlessly in its green leafy environment; the lovely earthy tones of the brick work further enhance this lovely feature.
• Upon entry it will become evident this beautifully appointed residence shares the truly special quality of creating a seamless inside/outside connection. A clever orientation and wonderful use of windows ensures a light and bright experience and a consistent link to the established garden settings.
• 4 generous bedrooms; the master is complete with ensuite, walk in robe and a ceiling fan. 3 additional bedrooms create a guest wing and are serviced by a family bathroom.
• A standout feature of this fine property is dual living areas of grand proportions.
• An eye catching kitchen has been born from a comprehensive 'spare no expense' renovation; it 'serves up' stylish contemporary finishes yet still 'nails' the brief for functionality. Expansive 50mm stone bench tops, custom cabinetry (soft close drawers and press touch cupboards), wine cooler, 900mm Smeg gas cook top and stainless steel appliances provide just a hint of what can be expected. A casual family lounge extends out to a paved alfresco zone via a glass sliding door; the canopy of an established wisteria tree provides lovely shade in the summer and is simply stunning when in full bloom.
• A formal lounge/dining possesses a warm and welcoming feel; a Jetmaster wood fireplace takes pride of place along with a stainless steel ceiling fan. A corner set window once again frames the lovely garden setting.
• A double remote car garage and additional off street vehicle accommodation further endorses the property's user friendly nature.
• An impressive 5kw solar power system is a substantial capital improvement and ensures this property ticks all the boxes.
• A must for an inspection if you desire a 'home' in every sense of the word!
Insights: 9 Wanawong Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT....A REAL GEM !
Within walking distance of the Drysdale village, parklands and all amenities, you can even forget the car. This villa shines just like new and has a real warmth which is enhanced by the natural light. A generous lounge room (north facing), adjacent dining and well equipped kitchen , double doors open to the garden. Two bedrooms a king and a double, both with BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet . Features include walk in pantry, dishwasher, split system, loads of storage, new carpets, quality window furnishings and more. Single garage (direct internal access) as well as second access for another vehicle if required. Absolutely nothing to do , will not last long, be quick.

Description:
Big Vistas For A Big Family
This is one of those rare homes with the “X” factor. In this case, a view that most home owners can only dream about. To say it’s spectacular is to sell it short. Located at one of the prime high points in Clifton Springs, the panorama stretches from west to east, taking in Leopold, Geelong and its harbour, the You Yangs and sparkling Port Phillip Bay. The large, 2-storey house itself is at the top end of Waterford Place, with an elevated driveway to a covered carport and single garage beyond. On the ground floor are four good-sized bedrooms, a bathroom and laundry. Upstairs the views really start to kick in, beginning with the huge open-plan kitchen/dining/loungerooms (there are two side-by-side) where a sliding door takes you to a west-facing deck that is a complete natural for alfresco entertaining. The well-equipped kitchen has an Omega electric oven and gas cooktop, plus a Dishlex dishwasher and a walk-in pantry. Adjacent is the dining area and then the two loungerooms - the second with a high gabled ceiling and a slow-combustion wood heater. Next door is the master bedroom, with a generous walk-in dressing room and a view to take your breath away. Currently, a neighbouring room is used as a nursery, but could be easily converted to an ensuite bathroom. The main bathroom, with shower and vanity, is located next to an office/study, which potentially could be another bedroom. Off this room is a second elevated deck that basks in the northern sunshine and provides an exciting alternative outdoor dining
option - and overlooks the rear lawn and garden shed. A spectacular coastal lifestyle awaits a truly fortunate family. Inspect today.
Insights: 8 Waterford Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
THE SECRET'S OUT.
It's what you don't see from the street that makes this home so appealing. 9 Bundarra St Clifton Springs presents beautifully, inside and out. Clipped standard Lily Pillies, Viburnum and English Box hedges welcome you to this family brick home built in 1985. Upon entering the home you're in the living room, however the large windows allow the outdoors in. Let the sunshine in. Warmed with free standing gas fire with additional split system heating cooling keeps the home comfortable year round. The kitchen has been recently updated while the dining area has splendid views of the garden. All 3 bedrooms are a generous size, all with built in robes. The master bedroom has a full ensuite. Plenty of storage options abound. Nearly 50m2 of undercover patio will be the envy of family and friends. It's an outdoor living room. Surrounded by a much loved garden full of azaleas, camellias and other hardy perennials. Raised garden beds frame the resilient couch lawn on the 605m2 block. A 15m2 tin shed hides one of 2 tanks holding over 3,000L combined, both fitted with pumps that irrigate the garden through the warmer months. Many of the custom made metal artwork and light boxes will remain with the property for you to enjoy. The current owners are out of here! They're loading up the motor home and heading off, who knows where. You have the opportunity to benefit from all of their hard work. This home will be auctioned on Saturday 13th of October unless sold prior.
Clifton Springs and Drysdale is only a 20 minute drive to Geelong and just 10 minutes away from first class golf courses, wineries, the Portarlington-Melbourne Ferry and everything that the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
Insights: 9 Bundarra Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
BELLARINE BLISS WITH THIS BAY BEAUTY.....FANTASTIC WATER VIEWS!
This home has a fantastic outlook over the You Yangs and Geelong by night, walk to the jetty, swim, enjoy The Dell , dine at the club ...stroll home, then have a cocktail on your balcony. Downstairs living room with decking area and two bedrooms with BIR'S, central bathroom and laundry. Upstairs second living space with balcony, adjacent kitchen and dining, all overlooking the bay. The master bedroom upstairs has WIR , ensuite and separate toilet which functions as a powder room. Features include 2 split systems, timber floors, dishwasher, pantry, induction stovetop and quality window furnishings. A double garage with tendam access to rear yard, garden shed and a blank canvas to create your own garden.

Description:
A WELL PROPORTIONED HOME GIVING SPACE AND PRIVACY.
An affordable family home close to schools, town and all amenities. No. 9 has a formal L-shaped lounge and dining area plus a spacious meals/family room, well designed kitchen, three double bedrooms, all with BIR'S , master with ensuite. Central bathroom , laundry and separate toilet. Features include gas cooking, dishwasher, 4-door pantry, new s/s rangehood, stovetop and oven, tinted windows and good storage. Huge covered rear decking is great for outdoor entertaining. It overlooks the north facing garden . Outside is a double carport, caravan or boat storage and a single steel garage or workshop. A short stroll to the golf club, picnic at the dell....shade , sun and water. A great place to call home.

Description:
Great value & potential bay views.
High on the hill and tucked away in a quiet location only moments to the beach, boat ramp, golf course, schools, shops and all that the Bellarine has to offer, awaits this fantastic opportunity to secure a solid family home with potential to extend up for impressive bay views.
The home comprises three bedrooms with robes, the master with access into the two-way bathroom, a large light filled living room, open plan kitchen with gas cooking, second living, separate laundry and toilet.
An undercover entertaining area opens to the North and the raised rear yard is a blank canvass for the garden enthusiast or great space for the kids and pets to play.
A carport and additional off street parking complete the home.
With the location so close to the bay, a choice of renowned beaches and coastal townships 15 minutes away, plenty of wineries to explore and the addition of the ferry to the Docklands just 10 minutes down the road, this is a fantastic investment or place to call home.
Call Dion to take advantage of this incredible opportunity.
Insights: 5 Gwinganna Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Tranquil Hidden Treasure.
Being ideally located at the rear of the block of only four units, offering privacy and security, surely makes this the pick of the bunch. Minutes from all amenities that Clifton Springs and Drysdale have to offer.This property is perfect for first home buyers, downsizers or would make a brilliant investment. A modern fresh interior makes the home sparkle like brand new.
Featuring an open plan lounge/meals area combined with a contemporary designed kitchen makes the home the perfect place to entertain guests and family.
Set on a low maintenance block of 252 square metres you can enjoy your own piece of tranquillity and peace.

Description:
A BELLARINE BEAUTY , BAY POSITION WITH APP. 1170 SQM. OF PRIVATE LAND
Extra generous proportions and space in and outside with bay views from kitchen, family room and deck. Appealing entrance, formal lounge room, formal dining room, central kitchen/meals space and large family room with doors opening to undercover decking, so easy to entertain all year round. Four bedrooms, master with big ensuite and WIR, BIR'S in two, study, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Features include ducted heating and air conditioning (cooling/heating zoned in 4 areas), leadlight, period fireplace, timber beams, pantry, dishwasher, NBN installed, quality throughout and so many jobs completed e.g. roof restored, guttering, new heat and air conditioning units. The natural light and north facing backyard is perfect. Three crossovers, side drive to extra-large (8M x 6M) double garage with access to rear yard, (building size incl. garage is approx. 32 squares). Within walking distance to the water front, golf course and the Dell, this home is a lifestyle choice in one of the best spots on the Bellarine. FABULOUS !

Description:
PERFECT POSITION ! PERFECT HOME ! LOTS OF EXTRAS !
Front door to the bay .....2 minutes, swim, walk or watch the magic from your living room. The sun filled living area includes kitchen, meals and generous living all looking down to the water. Two bedrooms, the queen main has four BIR'S , second two, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Large undercover entertaining space overlooking matured garden . Features central heating, split system,large pantry, quality window furnishings, surround sound through home, fans , ducted vac., attic ladder to big storage space, iron away, solar hotwater, outside awnings, watering system, water tank and more to view. Single garage with workbench space, tandem to back yard and garden shed. One of the best on the Bellarine , this beautiful home will not disappoint.

Description:
Perfect Entry Or Affordable Investment
As the Clifton Springs market enjoys continued growth, this solid beachside residence with great tenants already in place is the perfect entry or affordable investment. Enjoy ground level water glimpses or bay views from a potential second level (STCA), with a great existing floorplan this 3 bedroom home could be a very rewarding renovation project, with minimal effort!
-3BR solid brick home set on a corner 583sqm (approx.) allotment, with north facing living and dining
-Add your own style with a cosmetic update utilising the practical existing floorplan
-Water glimpses at ground level, with potential for stunning bay views from a second storey (STCA)
-Great investment opportunity with low maintenance gardens and tenants already in place
-Bright neutral interiors with well-placed windows to capture abundant northern light
-A central kitchen separates dining and living, providing families with two distinct zones for daily life
-Keep the cooking, storage and wash up configuration but update the joinery and appliances- easy!
-Sliding doors exit onto a covered deck that could be extended for alfresco entertaining (STCA)
-The quiet bedroom wing sits to the south beside a family bathroom with shower and bath
-Each bedroom is equipped with BIRs, the master with large built-ins and a spacious ensuite
-Laundry with built-in broom closet, space for washing machine and dryer with direct yard access
-Large rear yard offers a fenced area for children and pets, with a secure shed for garden tools
-Fence the front yard to create additional ‘usable’ outdoor space, to bask in all day sun
-Concrete driveway provides off street parking, with garage offering great storage and/or workshop
-Electric hot water system, gas wall furnace heating, and SS AC to main family living zone
-Short drive to a choice of local primary schools, with a bus stop out the front for secondary colleges
-Across the road from Clifton Springs Pre School, and Central Reserve with park and leafy trees
-Minutes to local shops and cafes in Drysdale or Curlewis, with Geelong CBD only 25mins away
-Central Bellarine Peninsula location with coastal towns, beaches and wineries all within reach
If you’ve been thinking of investing in the Clifton Springs market, the time is now – with strong growth expected for this suburb, you’ll want to be a part of this coastal success story!

Description:
Surprise packet!
Located in a sought-after pocket of Clifton Springs, this charming coastal home is the perfect bayside retreat. Offering 3 generous bedrooms, with living spaces with amazing views across the bay.
- Charming light filled residence with an enviable 585m2 prime land
- Attractive timber floor further enhances a lovely free flowing floor plan
- Decked entertaining zone provides year round comfort while you gaze across the waters edge, the impressive peaks of the You Yangs,
the dazzling lights of the skyline, and beautiful sunsets
- The new kitchen is light and bright, provide a great practical work space
- Backing onto public reserve, short walk to the waters edge
- All modern comforts; dual split system heating/cooling units and wood fire endorse this properties user friendly nature
Secure this impressive property and you are securing an amazing lifestyle; the highly regarded Golf Clubs is literally at your back door, neighbouring award winning winerys, great schooling/ shopping options and so much more to be discovered.
Rarely does a property become available in this sought-after pocket of Clifton Springs - call Brett Swan on 0490 815 913 and inspect today!

Description:
PERFECT , BAY & GOLF CLUB AT THE END OF THE STREET.
Too good to be true , affordable and one of the choice spots on the Bellarine Penisula. This sunny corner allotment provides space, leafy surrounds and a well maintained spacious home. Formal lounge and adjacent dining opens to private decking area, the second living area is flexible set up as a big dining room, change for your personal requirements. Three double bedrooms , all with BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include central heating , airconditioner , fans , pantry and more to view. Freestanding double garage with space for caravan/boat completes the picture of No. 213. So good for all leisure activities here swim at the Dell , eat at the club or have a good game of golf.

Address: 19A Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Impressive Townhouse with magical views
Modern spacious three bedroom townhouse with separate driveway, has magical panoramic views over the Bay from the upstairs balcony.
Upon entering this impressive residence you are welcomed by the spacious rumpus room with split system heating and cooling and opens onto the terrific sized backyard space. Two bedrooms, bathroom and laundry also occupy the downstairs accommodation.
Floorboards to most open areas and carpeted bedrooms.
Upstairs you are greeted with an extra large family, open plan designer kitchen complete with ample storage and prep areas. Suitable to cater for the largest of family gatherings.
Spacious lounge area with split system heating and cooling overlooks the fantastic deck which looks to infinity and beyond. Perfect for summer days and nights.
Master bedroom completes the accommodation with large walk in robe and full ensuite.

Description:
Ideal For Weekend Holidays
This elevated 3 bedroom home has spectacular views over Corio Bay to the You Yangs. Spacious lounge room with split system, adjoining dining area and well appointed electric kitchen with sliding glass doors out to a huge 3 x 12 metre entertaining deck for summer nights and endless bay views. 3 double bedrooms with plenty of storage, central bathroom and separate toilet, downstairs laundry with 2nd toilet. 2 minutes to the beach, 5 minutes to the golf course and boat ramp, and 10 minutes to the local wineries. So close to everything. There is undercover parking for cars, trailers and boats, plus enclosed storage area. Wake up to this delightful view every day!

Description:
Retreat Living
From the moment you step inside this beautiful home you’ll feel as if you’ve stepped into a tropical retreat.
The ambience of this home calls for rest, relaxation and rejuvenation! Featuring 4 large carpeted bedrooms, 3 living spaces, timber flooring, ducted heating and evaporative cooling as well as ceiling fans in the bedrooms, this home is perfect for the growing family and those looking for a little more space.
Upon entering, you are greeted by a formal dining and living room, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite and a large study/office. The open plan kitchen and meals area is ideal for entertaining and the family room flows outdoors to a tropical oasis of palm trees and bird of paradise plants. A large rumpus overlooks the lush green backyard and the double garage has convenient rear access. This home truly is one not to be missed!

Description:
QUALITY FAMILY HOME (APP. 1200 SQM), TRIPLE ACCESS .
You have it all here, light filled formal lounge with adjacent formal dining, second open plan living and meals, combined with excellent kitchen facilities all overlooking extra large undercover entertaining area. Set up as three bedrooms and a study, the large master bedroom has ensuite and WIR, remaining two bedrooms have BIR'S, central large bathroom with spa and great utility room. Features include slab heating, solid wood heater, reverse cycle AC., ceiling fans, ducted vac., quality window furnishings, updated kitchen appliances, hardwood cabinetry, extensive storage and more. The established garden provides privacy and fruit trees as well. Circular drive to big double garage, plus car spaces and second access to carport with room for another. Workshop with storage and work space.

Description:
A Serenity Bay Property to Treasure
You will super impressed with the bay lifestyle on offer here just a mere 500 meter stroll to either The Dell Beach or The Clifton Springs golf club or bowls club. Immaculate 3 bedroom brick veneer family on a huge 928m2 block is yours for the taking. Large light filled lounge has garden & street views with a gas heater & reverse cycle split system. Spacious master bedroom has bay windows with a snap shot view of the bay, walk in robe & full ensuite. Open plan modern kitchen & dining is very stylish with a glass splash back, stainless steel 5 burner gas cook top & rangehood. Also equipped with another reverse cycle split system, white electric oven & grill, dishwasher, walk in pantry & an abundance of cupboards. Sliding doors off dining lead you out to a great undercover deck perfect to entertain under all year round with more bay glimpses & golf course views. 2 living zone also has french doors, another gas heater & walk in robe perfect to store games, books or dvds. Off the hall we have the very spacious bedrooms 2 & 3 both with walk in robes, backyard & golf course views. Central bathroom has seperate shower & a working spa bath. Oversized double car garage with remote roller doors gives you internal access. Plus an additional large 10x6 meter garage with front & rear roller doors, also double gates for rear access off the reserve. Plenty of green yard to play family cricket or kick a football & if that's not enough, walk out the gate to access a huge reserve. Original owner/builders & on the market for the first time ever. With the boat ramp only a few minutes drive, the award winning Bellarine wineries just down the road and lots of supermarkets, shops, cafes, etc you will love your new home.
Insights: 5 Bogan Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
